name: Durjoy
description:
India and Pakistan were divided in 1947. Bangladesh were a part of Pakistan and known as East Pakistan.

In 1971, Bangladesh started the liberation war against Pakistan. This game is based on the war of 1971.

Somewhere in Bangladesh, player take control of a freedom fighter named Aftab. Player has to fight the Pakistani military in his own style: Chaos or Stealth. The game has two chapters: Take Over and The Hunt.

In Take Over, player with his teammates, has to take control over a Pakistani base and destroy their transport helicopter.

In The Hunt, player has to pursue a Pakistani General and capture him.

Player will have AK47, Pistol, Rocket Launcher, Knife and C4 as weapon. Player can choose his own play style. But it is always easy to play in stealth mode.
